content: Please, make sure that all the changes are successfully saved during this day.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a notice to users when they access a screen indicating planned maintenance on a bar. The message is displayed when the user clicks on a button or opens a dialog with this ID ("main-bar"), and informs them that any changes made during this period should be saved successfully.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation, while understandable, is a bit overly formal and literal for a user-facing disclaimer. A more natural and conversational tone would be preferable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Əmin olun ki, bütün dəyişikliklər günün sonuna qədər qorunub saxlanılsın.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure is a bit long and could be split for better readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Lütfən, gün ərzindəki bütün dəyişikliklərin qorunub saxlandığına əmin olun.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The verb tense in the Spanish translation is incorrect. "se guardan" (they save themselves) doesn't convey the intended meaning of "are successfully saved." It should use the conditional or future tense to indicate a desired outcome.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Por favor, asegúrese de que todos los cambios se guarden correctamente durante este día.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Finnish translation contains a redundant 'on' after 'tallennettu'. It makes the sentence sound awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Varmista, että kaikki muutokset on tallennettu onnistuneesti tämän päivän aikana.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is overly formal and doesn't capture the casual tone of 'Please, make sure...'. The phrasing 'Խնդրում ենք, համոզվեք...' (Khndrum em, hamoyvek...) sounds quite formal for a reminder to save changes.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more casual translation like 'Մերձեք, համոզվեք, որ բոլոր փոփոխությունները պահպանվեն այս օրվա ընթացքում:' (Merzek, hamoyvek, vor bolor popoxutyuner panev aysova entaakvm) or 'Համոզվեք, որ բոլոր փոփոխությունները պահպանված են այս օրվա ընթացքում:' (Hamoyvek, vor bolor popoxutyuner pahpanvazd en aysova entaakvm).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Italian translation uses the present tense 'sono state salvate' which implies a continuous action. It would be more natural to use the past perfect tense to indicate that the changes should have been saved by the end of the day.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Per favore, assicurati che tutte le modifiche siano state salvate con successo durante la giornata.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "Please, make sure that all the changes are successfully saved during this day." implies a request to verify the changes are saved. The Japanese translation "この日のうちにすべての変更が正常に保存されていることを確認してください" translates to "Please confirm that all changes are being saved normally during this day." While similar, it changes the nuance from verifying a successful save to confirming the process of saving. A more direct translation of 'verify' would be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: この日のうちにすべての変更が正常に保存されていることを確認するようお願いします。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation '이 때 모든 변경 사항이 성공적으로 저장되었는지 확인하시기 바랍니다' is a bit literal and sounds unnatural in Korean. A more natural phrasing would convey the meaning of ensuring all changes are saved.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Please ensure all changes are successfully saved.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While the translation isn't *wrong*, the phrasing '이 때' (at this time) is unnecessary and makes the sentence slightly awkward. It's not inherently incorrect, but it reduces the flow and clarity.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 모든 변경 사항이 성공적으로 저장되었는지 확인하시기 바랍니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "ກະລຸນາ, ກວດເພື່ອໃຫ້ແນ່ໃຈວ່າການປ່ຽນແປງທັງຫມົດໄດ້ຖືກບັນທຶກສໍາເລັດໃນລະຫວ່າງວັນນີ້." is a bit literal and can be improved for natural Lao flow. 'ກວດ' (kout) means 'check', but in this context, a more suitable word for 'make sure' would be 'ຮັບປະກັນ' (rap pra gan).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ກະລຸນາ, ຮັບປະກັນວ່າການປ່ຽນແປງທັງຫມົດໄດ້ຖືກບັນທຶກສໍາເລັດໃນລະຫວ່າງວັນນີ້.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Lūdzu, pārliecinieties, vai visas izmaiņas ir veiksmīgi saglabātas šīs dienas laikā' is a bit literal and can be improved for natural flow. The phrase 'šīs dienas laikā' (during this day) isn't the most natural way to express this in Latvian.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Lūdzu, pārliecinieties, ka visas izmaiņas ir saglabātas.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Upewnij się, że wszystkie zmiany zostały zapisane tego dnia pomyślnie' is a bit too literal and formal for a user-facing disclaimer. It could be simplified and made more natural.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Upewnij się, że zmiany zostały zapisane.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The addition of 'pomyślnie' (successfully) adds unnecessary length and doesn't significantly improve clarity. It can be omitted for a more concise message.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Omit 'pomyślnie'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation deviates from the original meaning. The English emphasizes ensuring successful saving of changes 'during this day'. The Portuguese 'no dia indicado' implies a specific day has been indicated, which isn't present in the original.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Por favor, certifique-se de que todas as alterações foram guardadas com sucesso durante o dia.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While grammatically correct, the use of 'guardou' is slightly less common and more formal than other options for 'saved' in this context. 'Salvou' might be more natural.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Por favor, certifique-se de que salvou todas as alterações feitas no dia indicado.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'cu success' is an awkward and unnatural way to express 'successfully'. While technically understandable, it's not idiomatic Romanian.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Vă rugăm să vă asigurați că toate modificările sunt salvate cu succes pe parcursul acestei zile.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'В течение дня убедитесь, что все изменения успешно сохранены.' is a literal translation, but it doesn't convey the polite and proactive tone of the English 'Please, make sure that all the changes are successfully saved during this day.' It sounds more like an instruction rather than a request.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Пожалуйста, убедитесь, что все изменения сохранены в течение дня.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'කරුණාකර මෙම දිනයේ සියලු වෙනස්කම් සාර්ථකව සුරැකී ඇති බවට වගබලා ගන්න' is a bit too formal and literally translates to 'Please ensure that all changes are successfully saved today'. A more natural and user-friendly translation would be 'දින තුල සියලු වෙනස්කම් සුරක්ෂිත වී ඇති බවට කරුණාවෙන් වගබලා ගන්න.' or 'දින තුල සියලු වෙනස්කම් සුරක්ෂිත බවට කාරුණිකව අවධානය යොමු කරන්න.'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: දින තුල සියලු වෙනස්කම් සුරක්ෂිත වී ඇති බවට කරුණාවෙන් වගබලා ගන්න.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Prosimo, poskrbite, da bodo vse spremembe uspešno shranjene za ta dan' is a literal translation that doesn't quite capture the natural flow and intention of 'Please, make sure that all the changes are successfully saved during this day.'  'During this day' can be better conveyed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Prosimo, poskrbite, da bodo vse spremembe uspešno shranjene v tem dnevu.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Молимо вас, уверите се да су све измене успешно сачуване у току овог дана.' is not a perfect translation of 'Please, make sure that all the changes are successfully saved during this day.'  'сачуване' is in the vocative case which isn't appropriate here. It should be in the nominative case.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Молимо вас, уверите се да су све измене успешно сачуване током овог дана.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'току' is unusual and not idiomatic in this context. It suggests a specific time period that isn't intended.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Using 'током' instead of 'току' makes the sentence flow more naturally and accurately reflects the English meaning.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Molimo vas, uverite se da su sve izmene uspešno sačuvane u toku ovog dana.' is a bit verbose and doesn't fully capture the simplicity of the English phrase 'Please, make sure that all the changes are successfully saved during this day.'  'Uverite se' (make sure) is technically correct, but a more natural phrasing would be preferred.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Molimo vas, proverite da su sve izmene sačuvane tokom dana.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure is a bit formal. While grammatically correct, it feels slightly unnatural for a disclaimer.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Molimo vas, proverite da su sve izmene sačuvane tokom dana.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The verb 'зроблені' (made) is unnecessary and grammatically awkward.  It implies someone made the changes, which isn't the intended meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Будь ласка, переконайтеся, що всі зміни, зроблені протягом дня, успішно збережено.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The verb 'збережено' (saved) is in the passive voice. While not strictly incorrect, a more natural phrasing would use the active voice.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Будь ласка, переконайтеся, що всі зміни, зроблені протягом дня, успішно збережіть.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'зроблені в цей день' (made this day) could be improved to 'зроблені протягом дня' (made during the day) to sound more natural in Ukrainian.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Будь ласка, переконайтеся, що всі зміни, зроблені протягом дня, успішно збережено.
